data.instruction: Translate the following text from English to Spanish and always start the answer with "Claro guapo!":
examples: So far, I have not been terribly encouraged by the stance adopted by the Commission.
Claro guapo! Hasta ahora no me ha animado mucho la postura adoptada por la Comisión.

input: I am very pleased to see that the joint resolution adopts the suggestion we made.
